name: .CDX File Extension
summary: Learn about .CDX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A CDX file contains an index of files or other data stored in a database. It is similar to a compact index (.IDX) file, but the leaf nodes at the lowest level of a compound index point to one of the tags in the index. CDX files were introduced in version 2 of Microsoft Visual FoxPro, which is a database management program for Windows.

content: The compound index is the native database index format used by Visual FoxPro. There are two types of CDX files:
Structural CDX file - Automatically opened and maintained by Visual FoxPro when the table is accessed and requires exclusive use of the table.
Non-structural CDX file - Not opened or maintained automatically by Visual FoxPro when the table is accessed and new records are added but does not require exclusive use of the table.
NOTE: Visual FoxPro was discontinued in 2007.
